question: There are Muslims who believe that Hawa was created from the rib taken from Adam that's why we find in a man one rib less. I would like to hear what our oulamaa say on this matter.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
Rasulallah said that Hawa (AS) was created from the rib of Adam (AS). We are
unable to comment on one rib being less in man.
